author: KIT-CMS
body:
#### PR description:

This is a backport for #43871, #47299 and #48408. It's similar to the backports #49022 (14_2_X) and #48557 (15_0_X) and #49039 (15_1_X).

#### PR validation:

Unit tests and release validations (136.901,136.902,136.903,136.904,136.905,136.906) are implemented.

We need a new release with this pull request to be able to use this with the CMS workflow management.
title: [14_0_X] Backport: Restructure and comment the tau embedding method
